elections.description:
A State Representative is a member of the South Carolina House of Representatives, the lower chamber of the South Carolina General Assembly. They are responsible for:
    *   Passing bills on public policy matters.
    *   Setting levels for state spending.
    *   Raising and lowering taxes.
    *   Voting to uphold or override gubernatorial vetoes.

candidates.description: Specific details about Waters' background can be found in news articles. She is running for the seat vacated by Marvin Pendarvis.
candidates.additionalNotes: Courtney Waters defeated Michelle Brandt and Kim Clark in the special Democratic primary held on January 21, 2025. Since no Republican candidates filed, Waters will face write-in opposition in the March 25 election.
